questions: What Are the Different Types of Juror Service For Which I Might Be Summoned By the New Jersey Judiciary?
what kinds of jury duty are there
answers: You may be summoned to serve as a Petit Juror, a Grand Juror, or a State Grand Juror. Petit jurors who sit on a criminal trial decide guilt or innocence in a criminal matter. Petit jurors who sit on a civil trial decide liability or damages. A Grand Jury determines whether there is enough evidence to move forward with criminal charges against a defendant.
